title: Jamais Vu
description: A gunshot echoes thrusting Darby Lambert into a near death experience. Inside the confines of an ambulance, she meets “the man in white light”. He takes away the guilt, but makes her question everything. “You will see them,” he whispers, as he catapults her back into the real world where she is plagued with dreams of demons, nurses, and rock stars. Why has He sent her back? Does she have the courage to rectify her sins? Given the chance, could you erase it all?
author: Monique O'Connor James
